attributes.action: Force the UK Media to go into lockdown
attributes.background: We are sick and tired of our UK media scaremongering and spreading Unverified story’s, life is hard enough at this moment and we don’t need the constant stupid questions on our daily update on Coronavirus

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the operation of the media. Complaints about the press are the responsibility of the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), not  the Government or Parliament. 

You might like to sign one or more of these petitions:

Criminalise the publication of unfounded false statements by the media
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303050 

Ensure balance and fairness in political reporting
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300700 

Corrections and clarifications in UK media to be as prominent as original story
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300557
